title: BRRI Scientists’ Association elections held
body: The executive council election of Bangladesh Rice Research Institute Scientists’ Association was held at the BRRI Auditorium in Gazipur on Thursday. Chief scientific officer and head of rice farming systems department Md Ibrahim has been elected as president and senior scientific officer of applied research department Muhammad Habibur Rahman Mukul elected as general secretary in the election, said a press release. ABM Anwar Uddin has been elected as vice-president, Mohammad Zahidul Islam as assistant general secretary, Md Harun-or-Rashid as treasurer, Afsana Ansari as social welfare secretary, Muhammad Rafiqul Islam as publicity and publication secretary and Md Saeed Hossain as office secretary in the election. Anwara Akhter, Khondaker Md Iftekharuddaula, ABM Zahid Hossain, Md Ruhul Amin Sarkar and ATM Sakhawat Hossain have been elected as executive members for central office. Mohammad Ekhlasur Rahman and Md Mahbubur Rahman Dewan have been elected as executive members for regional office. The newly elected committee has pledged to work together to further improve rice research activities, increase professional opportunities for scientists and maintain a research environment.
